source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_000<tab>Well met, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, and welcome to the Drownin' Wench! Consider me place yer 'ome away from 'ome.
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_000よお、よくきたな。
ようこそ、バデロンの酒場「溺れた海豚亭」へ！
ここは冒険者たちのふるさとだ！

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_001<tab>This town's famous fer lettin' any bugger in an' fer doin' naught to stop 'em leavin', so ye'd best get used to dealin' with free spirits.
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_001来る者を拒まず、去る者を追わずってのが、
この街の「自由なる気風」ってやつさ。
お前さんも気軽にやってくれ。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_002<tab>Most folk're still recoverin' from that thrice-damned Calamity, though, and are in sore need o' yer 'venturin' talents. Ye do yer best to put things to right, and I'll do me best to 'elp ye out when ye need it.
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_002だが、霊災後の傷跡も残る状況で、
冒険者の助けを必要としている者も多い。
お前さんの活躍を、期待しているぜ。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_010<tab>Well, well, look what the coeurl drug in! From all I 'ear, ye've been makin' a fine name fer yerself!
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_010よお、お前さんの噂、こっちにも届いてるぜ。
頑張ってるみたいじゃないか！

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_011<tab>An' to think, when ye first wandered into the Wench, ye could barely find yer way to the privy!
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_011右も左もわかんねぇような顔した駆け出しが、
ずいぶんと立派になったもんだ……感慨深いぜ。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_020<tab>Ah, so yer the <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> I've been 'earin' so much about. 'Tis a pleasure indeed to finally meet ye in the flesh.
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_020お前さんが)) (( )) 02 /var>か。
近頃、あっちこっちで活躍してるらしいな？

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_021<tab>The name's Baderon, an' this most 'ospitable of 'ostelries is the Drownin' Wench.
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_021俺の名はバデロン。
この「溺れた海豚亭」の店主をやっている。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_022<tab>'Tis a place where 'venturers like yerself gather to rest up, listen to the latest gossip, an' take on any tasks what need doin'. An' in this day an' age, there ain't no shortage o' tasks what need doin'. I 'ope yer good an' ready to pitch in, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>.
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_022ここは、お前さんたち冒険者が集まるラウンジだ。
こんなご時世だ……冒険者の助けを必要としてる者は数多い。
そういう連中に、お前さんの力を貸してやってくれ。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_030<tab>Well, if it ain't me ol' mate, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I barely recognized ye, what with that 'eroic aura obfuscatin' yer mug!
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_030)) (( )) 02 /var>じゃないか！
ハハ、立派になっちまって……見違えたぜ。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_031<tab>Now, what can this 'umble bartender do fer the champion of Eorzea, eh? A frothin' pint o' Baderon's best?
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_031「エオルゼアの英雄」さんが来るにしちゃ、
我ながら、ちょっとむさ苦しい店だと思うんだが……
変わらず顔を出してくれるのは嬉しいぜ。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_032<tab>Me place is always open, <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var>, so feel free to drop in whenever yer travels bring ye to Limsa!
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_032まぁ、店はいつでも開けてるからな。
また俺に、お前さんの元気な姿を見せてくれよ。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_040<tab>Now 'ere's a <var 08 E905 ((lass)) ((lad)) /var> I never tire o' seein'. 'Ave a seat, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and tell ol' Baderon what 'e can do for ye today.
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_040)) (( )) 02 /var>、よく来たな！
せっかくだから、ゆっくりしてけよ。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_041<tab>...A tale from me past? Aye, I could tell you a tale or two...but not today. Come back when ye've lived as long as me─if yer still kickin' around then, that is.
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_041……なに、俺の昔話がきになるって？
そうだなぁ……お前が俺より長く生き残ったら、
例のコインと一緒に、俺の自伝でも届けてやろう。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_050<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! The rumor mill's been spinnin' full tilt, but I see yer 'ead's still attached to yer body.
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_050)) (( )) 02 /var>……！
噂を聞いて心配してたが、ひとまず問題なさそうだな。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_051<tab>Them Ul'dahn bastards've got some nerve pinnin' that shite-stained accusation on the bloody hero of Eorzea. Limsa might be full o' pirates and cutthroats, but Thanalan's got its fair share o' black-hearted villains, an' that's the gods' honest truth.
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_051「エオルゼアの英雄」を、逆賊に仕立てあげようとは、
ウルダハの連中も大それたことをしやがる。
うちの都市も問題は多いが、あちらさんは相当酷いな……。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_052<tab>Ah, but I'd best reel in me tongue afore I get ye into more strife. The Wench is full of unfamiliar faces these days, and more'n a few of 'em make me nose twitch...
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_052おっと、滅多なことを口に出すもんじゃねぇか。
この店は、素性の知れない奴の出入りも多いからな。
ほとぼりが冷めるまでは、くれぐれも気をつけろよ。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_060<tab>The winds've carried me word o' yer fortunes, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I hear Nanamo's back on 'er feet, an' yer name's been cleared o' wrongdoin'.
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_060風のつてで聞いたぜ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
ナナモ様の「ご病気」がすっかり治って、
おまえさんも、晴れて大手を振って歩けるそうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_061<tab>Nasty bit o' business, that. But now that it's over, 'ow about ye pull up a stool an' 'oist a pint with some of me regulars? They won't know what we're celebratin', but that don't matter much─these sots'll drink to damn near anythin'!
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_061いやぁ、めでたいもんだ！
いっちょ、そこいらの奴も巻き込んで、パーッとやるか？
死線を越えた今となっちゃ、荒くれ者すら可愛いかろうさ。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_070<tab>Things sound a right mess out there on Gridania's border, an' if I know ye 'alf as well as I think I do, ye'll soon be back in the thick of it. Whatever 'appens, ye come back alive to tell the tale to ol' Baderon, eh?
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_070黒衣森の国境線が騒がしいそうだな。
この海都にも、噂は伝わってきているが……
何があっても生き残って、ここに帰ってこいよ？

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_080<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Sounds like ye've been 'avin' a right proper rumble with them imperial bastards. Bit worrisome to 'ear some o' me ol' mercenary mates 'ave lent their blades to the battle...
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_080よう、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
帝国との戦は激戦だったそうじゃないか。
傭兵時代の顔なじみも参戦してるもんで心配なんだ……。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_090<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, good to see ye 'ale an' 'ole. Word 'as it things are a right mess in Garlemald, but the towers are gone at least, so I'll take it as a small victory.
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_090無事だったか、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
帝都は散々な状況らしいが、
ひとまず、「終末の塔」が消えてホッとしたぜ。

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_100<tab>Just when we was pityin' the poor bastards over in Thavnair, those blasphemy abominations start appearin' in our own backyard. Things ain't lookin' good...
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_100ラザハンの惨状は伝え聞いている。
このラノシアにも、偽神獣とかいうのが現れたらしい。
まったく、世界はどうなっちまうんだ……？

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_110<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, ever a sight fer sore eyes! When yer starship came flyin' back, this ol' mercenary was weepin' tears o' joy, an' 'e ain't ashamed to admit it!
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_110よう、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
お前さんの乗った魔導船が戻ってきたときは、
そりゃもう感動もんだったぜ……！

source: TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_111<tab>Now, I ain't sure me bar's got anythin' worthy o' the savior of the star. But what we lack in quality, we can always make up fer in quantity, ain't that right!?
target:
TEXT_REGSEATHEDROWNINGWENCH_00158_BADERON_000_111「星を救った英雄」さんが来るにしちゃ、
やっぱり、ちょっとむさ苦しい店だと思うんだが……
これからも、変わらず顔を出してくれると嬉しいぜ！
